Title: Finland’s Gasum will stop Russian LNG imports in July
Description: Finland’s state-owned energy firm Gasum said it would halt imports of Russian LNG from July 26, which is the date the EU’s latest sanctions package on Russia takes effect.
Author: JS

Title: LNG ship takes Arctic route from Yamal, marks opening of Northern Sea Route for voyages to Asia
Description: The 172,000 m3 Eduard Toll Arc7 ice-class LNG carrier has left Russia’s 17.4 mtpa Yamal LNG plant in Sabetta and is in the Arctic Ocean, indicating that the Northern Sea Route (NSR) for shorter voyages to Asia has opened ahead of the official start of the NSR summer-autumn navigation season on Jul. 1.
Author: CK
